contentrichtext.text: {{Orphan|date=February 2009}} {{unreferenced|date=February 2009}} The '''Zona Boêmia ''' is a loosely defined term for a region in the commercial centre of [[Belo Horizonte]], [[Brazil]], noted for its abundancy of [[bar (establishment)|bar]]s, [[brothels]], [[sex theatre]]s and [[motels]], and many consider it the city's [[red light district]]. {{MinasGerais-geo-stub}} {{coord missing|Brazil}} [[Category:Red-light districts]] [[Category:Neighbourhoods in Belo Horizonte]]
